sopel --list-modules

A simple site to list user-submitted Sopel modules. Concept/WIP phase.

List of modules

Game

bombbot

Cut the right wire to stay alive!

Link handler

github

Fetches details about repositories, issues, and pull requests when users send GitHub links.

youtube

The youtube module fetches and displays metadata for posted YouTube links.

Lookup

wolfram

Provides a .wa command for querying Wolfram|Alpha.
